title: Artificer's Lore
content:
Artificer's Lore Effect Add twice your proficiency bonus to History checks. Requirements Rock Gnome

Artificer's Lore

Add twice your proficiency bonus to History checks.

Artificer's Lore is a Trait in Baldur's Gate 3. Traits provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.

Artificer's Lore Information

Add twice your proficiency bonus to History checks.

How to unlock Artificer's Lore

Artificer's Lore can be acquired by:

Artificer's
